subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance 2006 Scientific Workshop - places stillavailable
body:
Message-ID: <B6F840E0-83B5-4296-8445-52BF711CF78C@dmu.ac.uk>

Their are still some places available for the Radiance 2006
Scientific Workshop, both for presenters and attending only.

Date/venue: 13-14 (Wed-Thu) September, Queens Building, De Montfort
University, Leicester, UK.

Presentation outline/details:
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/radiance2006work.html

-John
